mapper.sql: health_id, health_ordid, health_evaluator, health_result, health_disease, health_status, health_addname, health_addtime, health_registrant, health_rtime, health_note

h.health_id, h.health_ordid, h.health_evaluator, h.health_result, h.health_disease, h.health_status, h.health_addname, h.health_addtime, h.health_registrant, h.health_rtime, h.health_note, h.timeliess
mapper.update: update jd_health set health_evaluator = #{healthEvaluator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, health_result = #{healthResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, health_disease = #{healthDisease,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, health_status = #{healthStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, health_registrant = #{healthRegistrant,jdbcType=INTEGER}, health_rtime = #{healthRtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, health_note = #{healthNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where health_id = #{healthId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update jd_health set timeliness = 1 where health_id = #{healthId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select , , ,
from jd_health h inner join service_nurse sn on h.health_registrant = sn.id inner join sys_user su on h.health_addname = su.id inner join service_nurse sn2 on h.health_evaluator = sn2.id where h.timeliness = 0 order by h.health_id desc
